SELECT REPORT_NO ,PROJECT_TITLE AS PROJECT_NO ,MEMBER_NICKNAME AS MEMBER_NO ,REPORT_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REPORT_DATE ,CASE WHEN REPORT_STATUS= 'P' THEN '진행중' WHEN REPORT_STATUS= 'D' THEN '처리완료'
END AS REPORT_STATUS FROM REPORT R JOIN PROJECT P ON(R.PROJECT_NO=P.PROJECT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO)
